snippet.title: La Lounge Chair Ottoman Eames Vitra - www.ideesboutique.com
snippet.description:
La Lounge Chair Ottoman Eames Vitra - www.ideesboutique.com
Toegevoegd door Mathieu Potin 2 jaren geleden
Le Lounge Chair allie depuis 1956 un confort absolu et une qualité du plus haut niveau tant dans les matériaux que dans la fabrication, Charles et Ray Eames s’étant inspirés du traditionnel fauteuil club anglais. C’est pourquoi ils créèrent le Lounge Chair, à l’origine avec un placage sombre et recouvert de cuir noir, mais ils le dotèrent, de bonne heure, d’une variante avec des coussins en cuir clair. La nouvelle interprétation du Lounge Chair, conçue en collaboration avec l’Eames Office, s’inscrit dans cette continuité ; ce classique est maintenant disponible dans une version au placage en noyer à pigments blancs, en aluminium poli et cuir blanc, qui se marie parfaitement avec les intérieurs clairs. La Lounge Chair est désormais également disponible dans une version offrant un confort optimal aux personnes de grande taille. La lounge chair est éditée par Vitra pour l'europe.http://www.ideesboutique.com/fauteuils/5273-lounge-chair-a-ottoman-cuir-noir-et-coque-palissandre-vitra.html
463 views

snippet.title: Chelsea Eames Style DSW & DAW Molded Plastic Dining Side Chair & Arm Chair
snippet.description:
Chelsea Eames Style DSW & DAW Molded Plastic Dining Side Chair & Arm Chair
Toegevoegd door Hot Products In The Market Reviews! 2 weken geleden
Buy it on Amazon: http://boxvimo.com/affiliate-link/ These are fun chairs that are so easy to put together and are light weight, so they are easy to move. But even being light weight, they are still very sturdy and can hold an adults weight easily. The plastic they are made of is very thick, and is easy and comfortable to sit on. Their base is made from wood and it bolts into the bottom of the chair. These chairs serve a very helpful purpose for us. My husband works in job that has him stopping home a few times each day throughout his shift for lunch and such. He's in law enforcement and he wears a deep blue uniform that almost looks black. We also have a house full of pets, most of them with light colored fur. Sitting down in the house in his uniform is so complicated, because our chairs all have fabric on them (which is bound to have some lint or a stray dog hair on it) or they have narrow arms on the sides. When in his uniform, he's wearing a duty belt packed with gear that makes him wider than usual. So he can't sit down in any chairs with arms or else his belt doesn't fit. And the way the uniform works, he can't just slip off his belt. So between fabric chairs getting lint and hair on his uniform and our chairs with arms being to narrow to fit into with his gear on, coming home to relax on break or during his lunch hour gets complicated. These chairs were the solution!
3 views
